item.title: Migrating Workflows from Atom to VS Code
item.description: This might just be my shortest post ever in this blog, at least for now. At this early date it’s just a link to the Atom No More? blog post in my personal blog. As time passes I’ll document here any work-specific changes I make to my new VS Code environments. And that’s a wrap. Until next time, stay safe and wash your hands! ðŸ˜„
